snippet: Lead negotiators said they were confident that a deal could still be reached, but observers said the compromises necessary to do so could weaken the deal so much as to make it nearly toothless.
lead_paragraph: Lead negotiators said they were confident that a deal could still be reached, but observers said the compromises necessary to do so could weaken the deal so much as to make it nearly toothless.

headline.main: Climate Negotiators Face Hurdles on Key Issues as Deadline Looms

keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
